channel.title: Run.Bat Issue
channel.description:
Hi, I've been playing RuneScape Private Servers for quite some time now, but I was screwing around one night and ended up fucking up my Run.Bat Path Code.
Here's the current code.
[code]@echo off title Run cd Files java -Xmx500m -cp . Class51 30 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]
Now, I've been trying to find a original Run.Bat code that has nothing to do with a certain private server but can work correctly.
I'm currently running on a 64 Bit Vista Computer.
Here's the problem it says.
[code]The system cannot find the path specified. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Class51 Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Class51 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Class51. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Help? Any brief detailed guide would be nice. :)

item.title: Run.Bat Issue
item.dc:creator: @Mike194 Mike194

@Mike194 wrote:

Says…

The system cannot find the path specified

…
Could not [size=18pt]find[/size] the main class: Class51. Program will exit.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat Issue
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Nope. Change jre7 to jre6.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat Issue
item.dc:creator: @Mike194 Mike194
item.description:
@Mike194 wrote:

None work, I have JRE6 and Java 23 Should I update? Maybe that will help.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat Issue
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Change it to:

@echo off title Run cd Files java -Xmx500m -cp Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 pause

If not try this:

@echo off Title Client cd Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 pause

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat Issue

item.description:
@Mike194 wrote:

Not sure where that is, could you give me a location? Not so great with this. :\

Read full topic

item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

Where it says “cd Files” make sure the the “Files” is whatever directory of your class files.

item.description:
